analysis.description:
VentanaToken.refund (/unique_chucks/7/0x30cefbcb5c26a5b19a019092ab8d09f8739c904f.sol#576-602) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- _addr.transfer(value) (/unique_chucks/7/0x30cefbcb5c26a5b19a019092ab8d09f8739c904f.sol#599-600)

VentanaToken.destroy (/unique_chucks/7/0x30cefbcb5c26a5b19a019092ab8d09f8739c904f.sol#693-703) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- require(bool)(this.balance == 0)

ERC20Token.symbol should be constant (/unique_chucks/7/0x30cefbcb5c26a5b19a019092ab8d09f8739c904f.sol#145)
VentanaToken.END_DATE should be constant (/unique_chucks/7/0x30cefbcb5c26a5b19a019092ab8d09f8739c904f.sol#389-391)
